Title: The Hit Producer
Writer: Niall Queenan (screenplay), Niall Queenan, Kevin de la Isla O'Neill (original story), Kevin de la Isla O'Neill (story)
Actors: Michelle Doherty, Neill Fleming, Fergus Kealy, Susan Barrett
Plot: Katelin Ballantine, a struggling movie producer in search of an investor, reluctantly follows the promise of money into Dublin's drug underworld where she witnesses a botched murder attempt...
